titleStmt.title: Íslendingabók Ara fróða : AM 113 b fol : A digital edition

availability.p: Licence accepted by the editor Matteo Tarsi in mail to Odd Einar Haugen 29 December 2015.

msIdentifier.repository: The Árni Magnússon Institute for Icelandic Studies, Reykjavík, Iceland

projectDesc.p: This manuscript text has been encoded according to the standard set out in The Menota handbook (version 2.0 beta), at http://www.aksis.uib.no/menota/guidelines as of 2008-05-16.

normalization.p: This manuscript text has been encoded on three levels: facsimile, diplomatic and normalised. The normalised text given here is according to Jakob Benediktsson's edition Íslendingabók:Landnámabók (Íslenzk Fornrit I, Reykjavík 1986)

correction.p: This text has been thoroughly proofread and cross-checked by the editor before publication

interpretation.p: This text has been fully lemmatised and morphologically analysed according to the rules specified in ch. 8 of the Menota Handbook, v. 2.0

revisionDesc.change:
2020-02-25
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Changed the three instances of “eE” to “eP” (enclitic pronoun) according to the v. 3.0 guidelines of Menota

2020-02-20
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : Made a few consistency corrections of the me:msa name tokens

2016-03-15
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Added a missing "lb" on fol. 1v, line 13; (2) Made the file v. 1.0.4

2016-02-18
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Revised the "availability" element in the header with a CC-BY-SA 4.0 licence; (2) Added information about "lb" (in one case, "pb" and "lb") within a word also on the normalised level (78 instances), in order to optimise display in the Corpuscle application; (3) Made the file v. 1.0.3

2016-01-18
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Replaced a single entity "oeslashacute" with "oslashacute" (in the lemma form for "Hœngsson"; (2) Added as "msName": Íslendingabók; (3) Made the file v. 1.0.2

2016-01-12
Odd Einar Haugen University of Bergen : (1) Added the attribute ed="ms" to all "pb" and "lb" elements; (2) Made the file v. 1.0.1

2015-12-29 Odd Einar HaugenUniversity of Bergen: Received a fully valid file from Matteo Tarsi, and only changed the initial links to the schema and entity list, also updated the information in the publication and edition statements

vetra ens níunda hundraðs
